definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The juice of plants of any kind, especially the ascending and descending juices or circulating fluid essential to nutrition .
( uncountable ) The sapwood , or alburnum , of a tree.
( slang , countable ) A naive person; a simpleton .
examples: Look at the sap mowing our lawn while we pretend our own lawnmower is broken.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The juice of plants of any kind, especially the ascending and descending juices or circulating fluid essential to nutrition .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The sapwood , or alburnum , of a tree.
( slang , countable ) A naive person; a simpleton .

definitions.definition: ( countable , US , slang ) A short wooden club ; a leather-covered hand weapon ; a blackjack .

main_definition: ( countable , US , slang ) A short wooden club ; a leather-covered hand weapon ; a blackjack .

definitions.definition: A narrow ditch or trench made from the foremost parallel toward the glacis or covert way of a besieged place by digging under cover of gabions , etc.

main_definition: ( military ) A narrow ditch or trench made from the foremost parallel toward the glacis or covert way of a besieged place by digging under cover of gabions , etc.
